column4: hello, I just burnt a few files to a cd from my mac, now I put them in my Ubuntu box and all the filenames have been lower-cased? have I missed some mount option somewhere?
can your mac burn with the 'rock ridge' filesystem?
you've probably burned a disc with a mac filesystem that ubuntu can't understand
the files all come over ok, it is just the casing of the filenames that is of. I'll look into the 'rock ridge'
